ContentNode.title: Sr Software Engineer
ContentNode.description: With the reorginazation to Disney Entertainment and ESPN Product & Technology, I am now on the News Frontend team, where I work as the ABC News release manager and additionally contribute to our 8 local stations as well as Good Morning America

ContentNode.title: Software Engineer II
ContentNode.description: In 2018, with Disney consolidating their multiple technology groups under one umbrella, ESPN Technology became part of Walt Disney Direct-to-Consumer & International. Because of this, in addition to working on products for the Worldwide Leader in Sports, I also contributed to our other brands including ABC, Disney, FX, and National Geographic

ContentNode.title: Software Engineer
ContentNode.description: My journey with ESPN began on the Product Engineering team where I worked on maintaining multiple consumer facing sites including espn.com, secsports.com, and espnfc.us..

ContentNode.title: Web Developer
ContentNode.description: I started with Pixel Supply as an intern sophomore year, and then was hired on full-time after I graduated. While there, I worked on many different e-commerce websites for our clients on the Shopify platform. I also built the companyâ€™s first Shopify app, UrPic, using Ruby on Rails

ContentNode.title: BS, Computer Science
ContentNode.description: I graduated from the University of Florida (go Gators!) with a degree in Computer Science. This is where my passion for web development began, and where I spent many late nights trying to cram just one more feature into my assignments
